Package search

This package provide classes that can search Files ,search LAN ,and provide classes and Interface for Recommendation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LanUserList
    This Interface is used to get list of all connected users and shared list of the users.
    Recommendation
    provide method Recommendation.getRecommendation() and others to get List of Recommendation.
    SearchKeyword
    Must be implemented properly because multiple threads accessing it in same time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileSearchSingleSystem
    Search keywords etc using single system.
    FindLANShared
    Find shared list so may take time.
    NetFiles
    Information of shared Files.
    SearchBasedRecommendation
    Provide search based recommendation.
    SearchFolder
    Provide static Methods for Folder Searching.

Package search Description

This package provide classes that can search Files ,search LAN ,and provide classes and Interface for Recommendation.

kamal
